channel.title: PC Magazine: New Product Reviews
channel.description: First looks at new products from PC Magazine: lab-based test, ratings, editor and user reviews.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2006 Ziff Davis Media Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Sprint Fusic by LG (LG LX550)
item.description: The era of stereo Bluetooth music phones begins with the adorable, flexible Fusic by LG.

item.title: ADV: Get your teams deliverables & costs on track
item.description: Start using QuickBase, the hosted, Web-based solution from Intuit, to better manage your projects. Keep your employees up to date on the latest information so they can take action sooner. QuickBase pricing begins at $249/mo for 10 users. Sign up for a free trial.

item.title: Apple MacBook Pro 17-inch
item.description: For creative professionals who rely on Apple to get the job done, look no farther than the MacBook Pro (17-inch). Everyone else can shop around.

item.title: Acer Travelmate 4202WLMi
item.description: It won't win you over with its design or any extensive features, but its power and price tag will catch your attention.

item.title: Palm Treo 700p
item.description: An upgrade to a classic, the Palm Treo 700p is the most well-rounded PDA/phone available today.

item.title: Pioneer PDP-5060HD
item.description: The Pioneer PDP-5060HD produces beautiful imagery, and it represents the best value the company has ever offered in a 50-inch panel. The TV's A/V input selection is limited, but the panel's picture quality and performance rank among the best I've seen among comparable displays.

item.title: Sprint PCS Vision Phone SCP-3100 by Sanyo
item.description: Calls sound good on the Sanyo SCP-3100, but you probably won't want to be seen making calls on it.

item.title: Falcon Northwest Mach V FX-62 Quad
item.description: Thanks to its über-advanced components, the Falcon Northwest Mach V FX-62 Quad is a fire-breathing beast with amazingly fast performance.

item.title: Helio Kickflip
item.description: The Helio Kickflip isn't ready for retail sale yet. Wait until they fix the bugs.

item.title: Helio Hero
item.description: The Helio Hero is a good, powerful phone for MySpace fanatics, but other folks will find it a tough sell.

item.title: Altec Lansing inMotion IM9
item.description: The IM9 is powerful enough for nearby listening outdoors and in small rooms indoors but it distorts at higher volumes.
